column1:
7.4.1	
Summary of evidence and guidelines for the treatment of urothelial carcinoma of the prostate

In locally-advanced urethral carcinoma, cisplatin-based chemotherapy with curative intent prior 
to surgery might improve survival compared to chemotherapy alone, or surgery followed by 
chemotherapy.

In locally-advanced SCC of the urethra, treatment with chemoradiotherapy might be an alternative to 
surgery.
In locally-advanced urothelial- and SCC of the urethra, treatment in academic centres improves OS.
